EngLawName: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Edible Offal of Cattle, Sheep, Pig and Poultry
LawName: 牛羊豬及家禽可食性內臟重金屬限量標準
EngLawHistories:
1.Promulgated on June 29, 2004
2.Amended on August 20, 2013
3.Abolished on August 15, 2019

EngLawArticles.EngArticleContent: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals:
┌────────────────┬─────────────┐
│Heavy metal                     │Lead                      │
├────────────────┼─────────────┤
│Maximumtolerance                │0.5                       │
│（ppm, wet weight basis）       │                          │
└────────────────┴─────────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
